title: New: Jay Electronica – Rough Demo
body:
**[Jay Electronica](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/946-single-of-the-week-jay-elecronica/ "Single of The Week: Jay Elecronica")** is perhaps the only artist currently producing work that could inspire me to write an article at 10.30pm, all as a result of a demo that may or may not be from his next album, Act II. As running jokes go, when and if the album will be dropped, is quickly becoming a quip that no longer remains funny. Couple that with the fact that this demo isn’t even complete, and you’ve got yourself one frustrated listener. Despite the frustration, the track is a real treat. The rhymes are thoughtful and introspective, the beats jazzy and organic, the overall package is too damn attractive to stay mad for too long.

Hit play and stay hopeful.
